question: At the arcade Dave had won 18 tickets. _____ and 11 more to buy some clothes, How many tickets did Dave have left?
Ryan learns english and chinese for 7 days. _____ and 5 hours on learning chinese. How many hours does he spend on learning english and chinese in all?
Nell collects baseball cards. She gave 301 of her cards to Jeff and _____. How many cards did Nell have initially?
Rachel's tree had 4 apples. _____. Thereafter 3 new apples grew on the tree. How many apples are there on the tree now?
Paco had 26 salty cookies and _____. He ate 14 sweet cookies and 9 salty cookies. How many salty cookies did Paco have left?
A grocery store had 49 bottles of regular soda, _____ and 6 bottles of lite soda. How many bottles of regular soda and diet soda did they have altogether?
There were 13 roses and _____. Jessica cut some more roses and orchids from her flower garden. There are now 91 orchids and 14 roses in the vase. How many roses did she cut?
Dan has $ 4. _____candy bar for $ 3 each one costing the same amount of money. How much money is left?
Dan has $ 5. He bought a cand _____ and a chocolate for $ 3. How much money did he spend to buy chocolate than he did to buy candy bar?
Katie had 91 ds games and _____ and old friends had 53 games. How many games do her friends have in all?
If you have 14 cookies in total and _____, How many cookies does each bag have?
Jerry had 7 books and _____. Later he added 2 more action figures to the shelf. How many more books than action figures were on his shelf?

The grasshopper, the frog and the mouse had a jumping contest. The grasshopper jumped 24 inches. _____ and the mouse jumped 5 inches lesser than the frog. How much farther did the mouse jump than the grasshopper?
5 storks and _____. 4 more birds came to join them. How many more birds than storks are sitting on the fence?
Jake has 6 fewer peaches and _____. Steven has 17 peaches and 16 apples. How many more peaches than apples does Steven have?
There are 18 bananas in Philip's banana collection. _____, How many groups are there?
Rachel had to complete 8 pages of math homework, _____ and 3 more pages of biology homework. How many pages of math and biology homework did she have to complete?
The Ferris wheel in paradise park has 18 seats. _____. If 10 seats are broken, How many people can ride the Ferris wheel at the same time?
There are a total of 16 peaches in a basket. _____ and some more green peaches in the basket. How many green peaches are in the basket?
Zachary did 44 push-ups and _____. David did 29 more push-ups but 13 less crunches than zachary. How many crunches did David do?
At the arcade Dave had won 14 tickets and _____. If he used 10 to buy some toys, How many tickets did Dave have left?
Josh had 22 marbles in his collection. _____. How many marbles does he have now?
Dan has $ 3. _____candy bar for $ 4, each one costing the same amount of money. How much did each candy bar cost?
Jessie currently weighs 9 kilograms. _____ and 140 kilograms in the second week. How much did she weigh before starting to jog?
They decided to hold the party in their backyard. They have 2 sets of tables, each having the same number of chairs. _____, How many chairs are there for each table?
An industrial machine made 9 shirts yesterday and _____. It can make 2 shirts a minute. How many minutes did the machine work today?
Baker made 43 cakes and _____. If he sold 154 pastries and 78 cakes, How many more pastries than cakes did baker sell?
A grocery store had 22 bottles of regular soda and _____. How many more bottles of diet soda than regular soda did they have?
There were some roses in the vase. Jessica cut 16 more roses from her flower garden and put them in the vase. _____. How many roses were there in the vase at the beginning?
In a school there are 362 boys and _____. 403 more girls joined the school. How many more girls than boys does the school have?
Paul had 50 books. _____. How many books did he buy?
Ed had 19 more marbles than Doug. Ed lost some of his marbles at the playground. _____. How many marbles did Ed lose?
In a school there are 700 girls and the rest are boys. _____, How many pupils are there in that school?
Paco ate 19 cookies and _____. How many cookies did he have in the beginning?
Kelly has 106 nintendo games. _____

Carol was sending out birthday invitations to her friends. Each package of invitations she bought had 10 invitations in it and _____. If she sends invitations to only 2 friends, How many invitations will be left?
A grocery store had a total of 17 bottles of which 9 were bottles of regular soda and the rest were bottles of diet soda. _____. How many bottles of diet soda did they have?
The grasshopper, the frog and the mouse had a jumping contest. The grasshopper jumped 25 inches. _____ and the mouse jumped 26 inches lesser than the frog. How far did the mouse jump?
Adam has 3 more apples than jackie. _____. How many apples does Jackie have?
For the walls of the house he would use 4 nails in all to secure large planks of wood. _____, How many planks does John need for the house wall?
Last week Fred had 33 dollars and _____. Over the weekend Fred delivered newspapers earning 16 dollars and washed cars earning 74 dollars. How much money did Fred earn over the weekend?
There are 8 different books and _____. If you read 19 of the books and watched 61 of the movies, How many more movies than books are there in the ' crazy silly school ' series?

After eating a hearty meal they went to see the Buckingham palace. There were 71 paintings in the Buckingham palace. There, _____. If there were 188 visitors the previous day, How many visited the Buckingham palace within 57 days?
33 campers went rowing in the morning 34 campers went rowing in the afternoon and _____. How many more campers went rowing in the afternoon than in the evening?

The grasshopper, the frog and the mouse had a jumping contest. The grasshopper jumped 19 inches. _____ and the mouse jumped 20 inches farther than the frog. How much farther did the mouse jump than the grasshopper?
He then went to see the oranges being harvested. He found out that they harvest 31 sacks of ripe oranges and _____. How many sacks of unripe oranges will they have after 45 days of harvest?

Jerry had 7 action figures on a shelf in his room. Later he added some more action figures to the shelf and _____. If there are 8 action figures on his shelf now, How many action figures did he add to the shelf?

Because of the decision Sofia asked the students to suggest specific types of food. 182 students suggested adding mashed potatoes while others suggested adding bacon to the menu. _____, How many students suggested bacon?
The grasshopper and the frog had a jumping contest. The grasshopper jumped 9 inches and _____. How much farther did the frog jump than the grasshopper?
White t - shirts can be purchased in packages of 53. _____ and 34 trousers, How many white t - shirts will she have?
Lewis earns $ 368 every week during the 1359 weeks of harvest. _____, How much money does he pay as rent during the harvest season?
Melissa played 3 games and _____. How many points did she score in each game?
They decided to hold the party in their backyard. They have 10 sets of tables and _____. If there are 11 people sitting on chairs, How many chairs are left unoccupied?
Robin cut off 13 inches of his hair. _____, How long is his hair now?

For the walls of the house he would use 12 large planks of wood and _____. If each large plank of wood needs 14 pieces of nails to be secured and each small plank needs 25 nails. How many planks does John need for the house wall?
An industrial machine can make 6 shirts a minute. _____ and for 12 minutes today. How many shirts did machine make today?
Baker made 52 pastries and _____. If he sold 102 cakes and 94 pastries, How many more cakes than pastries did baker make?
In Haley's class 4 are boys who love to play marbles. _____ and wants to keep 15 marbles for herself, How many will each of the boys receive?
A mailman has to give 25 pieces of junk mail to each block. _____, How many houses are there in a block?
Rachel picked 3 ripe apples from her tree. _____ and 27 unripe apples. How many ripe apples did the tree have to begin with?
He then went to see the oranges being harvested. He found out that they harvest 25 sacks of unripe oranges and _____. How many sacks of ripe oranges will they have after 73 days of harvest?
During summer break 907611 kids from Lawrence county stay home and _____. About how many kids are in Lawrence county?
For Gwen's birthday she received 3 dollars from her mom. _____. If she spent 4 dollars. How much more money did she receive from her dad than she did from her mom?
Jessie weighed 114 kilograms. _____ and 60 kilograms in the second week. How much does she weigh now?
There are 10 peaches distributed equally in some baskets. _____ and 6 green peaches, How many baskets of peaches are there?
The grasshopper, the frog and the mouse had a jumping contest. The grasshopper jumped 19 inches. _____ and the mouse jumped 94 inches lesser than the frog. How far did the frog jump?
In Haley's class some boys love to play marbles. Haley gives 2 marbles to each boy. _____, How many boys did she give the marbles to?
Rachel has 4 apple trees. _____. Now the trees have a total 29 apples still on them. How many apples did Rachel pick in all?
Allan brought 6 balloons and _____. Jake then bought 3 more balloons at the park. How many more balloons did Allan have than Jake in the park?
Every day Ryan spends 2 hours on learning english, _____ and 4 hours on learning spanish. How many more hours does he spend on learning chinese than he does on learning spanish?
Bobby had 22 pieces of candy. He ate some pieces of candy. _____. If he still has 8 pieces of candy left, How many pieces of candy had he eaten at the start?
23 children were riding on the bus. _____. Then there were 8 children altogether on the bus. How many more children got off the bus than those that got on?
41 children were riding on the bus. At the bus stop some children got off the bus. _____. How many more children were on the bus before the bus stop than there are now?
Rachel has 3 apple trees. _____. Now the trees have a total 9 apples still on them. How many apples were there on all trees initially?

The Razorback t-shirt shop makes $ 78 dollars off each t-shirt sold. During the Arkansas game and _____. If they sold 172 t-shirts during the Arkansas game, How much money did they make from selling the t-shirts during the Texas tech game?
Jake has 3 fewer peaches than Steven who has 8 more peaches than Jill. _____. How many more peaches does Jake have than Jill?
Rachel had to complete 4 pages of reading homework, _____ and 19 more pages of biology homework. How many more pages of math homework than reading homework did she have?
Paco had 37 sweet cookies and _____. He ate 5 sweet cookies and 2 salty cookies. How many more sweet cookies than salty cookies did he eat?
A waiter had 13 customers. _____. If he still had 9 customers, How many customers left?

Nell collects cards. She had 309 baseball cards and _____. She gave some of her cards to Jeff and now has 415 baseball cards and Ace cards left. How many more baseball cards than Ace cards does Nell have?
There are 3941 skittles in Steven's skittles collection. _____. If the erasers are organized into 495 groups, How big is each group?
6 storks and _____. 3 more birds came to join them. How many more storks than birds are sitting on the fence?
Bobby had 20 pieces of candy. _____candy. Then he ate 18 more. How many pieces of candy did Bobby eat?
There are 142 bananas and _____. If the bananas are organized into 47 groups and oranges are organized into 178 groups, How big is each group of oranges?
Allan brought 5 balloons and _____. Jake then bought 3 more balloons at the park. How many balloons did Jake bring to the park?
Stray cats loved eating goldfish in the pond leaving 6 goldfish. _____. How many goldfish disappeared?
Josh had 19 marbles in his collection. _____ and found 5 new ones. How many marbles does he have now?
The bananas in Philip's collection are organized into 196 groups. _____, How big is each group?
He then went to see the oranges being harvested. He found out that they harvest 74 sacks per day and _____. How many sacks of oranges will they have after 51 days of harvest?
Lewis earns $ 491 every week during the 1181 weeks of harvest. _____, How much money will have at the end of the harvest season?
Baker made 62 cakes. _____. He sold 144 of them. How many cakes would baker still have?
Tiffany was collecting cans for recycling. On monday she had some bags of cans. The next day she found 4 more bags worth of cans. _____, How many bags did she have on monday?
Dan has $ 4. _____candy bar each one costing the same amount of money. How much money is left?

Carol was sending out birthday invitations to her friends. Each package of invitations she bought had 3 invitations in it and _____. If she wants to invite 9 friends, How many extra invitations will she need to buy?
Paco had 6 cookies. _____ and ate 23 cookies. How many more cookies did he give to his friend than those he ate?
Rebecca wants to split a collection of eggs into groups of 11. _____, How many eggs does Rebecca have?
They decided to hold the party in their backyard. They have 14 chairs for each set of table. _____, How many more chairs than tables do they have?
Mary is baking a cake. The recipe calls for 9 cups of sugar 14 cups of flour and _____. She already put in 4 cups of flour. How many more cups of flour than cups of sugar does she need to add now?
Frank was reading through his favorite book. The book had 612 pages equally distributed over 24 chapters. _____. How many pages did he read per day?
Matthew had 14 crackers and _____. If Matthew gave equal numbers of crackers and cakes to his 7 friends, How many crackers and cakes did each person eat?
